spatial_accuracy.notes: Major spatial failures. The layout is mirrored/inverted compared to the plan. The primary entrance and lounge transition is completely lost. Window and door placements do not align with the architectural drawing.

structural_fidelity.notes: The garage is missing entirely. Adjacency relationships between the kitchen, laundry, and bathroom are failed. The interior corridor logic is fundamentally broken, creating impossible room transitions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is placed in rooms that do not exist on the plan (hallucinated third bedroom). Scale is inconsistent with room dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric camera angle and soft lighting. Geometry is clean despite being architecturally incorrect. Text rendering is distorted.

detected_errors.description: Missing Garage and specific Laundry/WC partitioning from the original plan.
Bathroom and Kitchen swapped or misplaced relative to the entryway.
Hallucinated third bedroom; the plan only specifies two bedrooms.
The proportion of the lounge/dining area is severely compressed compared to the bedrooms.
Text labels from the 2D plan are rendered as distorted artifacts on the 3D floor.
